definition: ear of grain/gerbe (used on coats of arms)
abbr. for Guangzhou 廣州|广州[Guang3 zhou1]

sentences.english: The next spring the seeds should be knocked out of their seed-heads and planted.
sentences.chinese: 來年的春天的種子應被裁減，他們的穀穗和種植的。

sentences.english: Then he said that they should be hung up to dry.
sentences.chinese: 然後再把那些穀穗掛起來晾乾。

sentences.english: He advised farmers to choose the best-heads.
sentences.chinese: 他勸告農民要遴選最好的穀穗。

sentences.english: In the following spring , the seeds should be knocked out of the seed-heads and sown.
sentences.chinese: 第二年春天，種子應該從穀穗中打出來，然後播種。
